zxiong.shapes

类 Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • zxiong.shapes.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Circle()
      Creates a default instance of a Circle object with all dimensions set to zero
      Circle(double x, double y, double radius)
      Creates a new instance of a Circle object*

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Draws a new instance of a circle object with the left and right edges of the circle at x and x + width.
      double getArea()
      Calculates and returns the area of the Circle

      Calculates and returns the parimeter of the Circle

      Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this Circle

      Reset all dimension of a circle to zero

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Circle

        public Circle()
        Creates a default instance of a Circle object with all dimensions set to zero.*
        Postcondition:
        Create a circle with all dimensions of zero

      • Circle

        public Circle(double x,
              double y,
              double radius)
        Creates a new instance of a Circle object*
        参数:
        x - X-coordinate
        y - Y-coordinate
        radius - Radius of the circle
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: Dimension set to imported values

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        Calculates and returns the parimeter of the Circle
        返回:
        The preimeter of the circle

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Calculates and returns the area of the Circle
        返回:
        The area of circle

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this Circle
        参数:
        x - The X-coordinate of the point
        y - The Y-coordinate of the point
        返回:
        True if point is inside, false if point is outside

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws a new instance of a circle object with the left and right edges of the circle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        参数:
        marker - The surface PApplet draws on

      • setDimension

        public void setDimension(double x,
                         double y,
                         double radius)
        Set new dimension of a circle
        参数:
        x - x-coordinate of the circle
        y - y-coordinate of the circle
        radius - Radius of the circle
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: the dimensions of the circle will be the input values

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset all dimension of a circle to zero
        Postcondition:
        Side affect: All dimension reset to zero
